Summary: An object was flying across the sky with a contrail behind it & disappeared for 3 seconds only to reappear again.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a MUFON Field Investigator and while on assignment handling 3 cases for MUFON in Altoona, PA, I was looking up in the sky and I witnessed an object flying across the sky with a contrail behind it. It flew through a very small cloud bank to open sky & while in the open sky, it disappeared for 3 seconds only to reappear again emitting the contrail. When it was invisible, no contrail was seen.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There were no other sightings in Altoona on or around June 26th 2008
